description:
Slot-first form field wrapper with labels, validation messages, and a11y wiring.

Wraps any input/textarea/select via the default slot and provides automatic
label association, aria-describedby wiring for help/validation messages, and
consistent styles across sizes and validation states. Gracefully degrades by
rendering a default text input when no slot content is provided.

props.name: id
props.description: Custom element id for the input. If omitted, a stable id is auto-generated and associated with the label.

props.name: labelPosition
props.description: Label placement. Valid values: top (default), inline, hidden

props.name: label
props.description: Visible label text. When labelPosition="hidden", keep for a11y but hide visually; also consider aria-label on the input.

props.name: helpText
props.description: Helper text shown only in the default validation state. Included in aria-describedby.

props.name: errorMessage
props.description: Error message shown when validationState="error". Included in aria-describedby and sets aria-invalid.

props.name: successMessage
props.description: Success message shown when validationState="success". Included in aria-describedby.

props.name: warningMessage
props.description: Warning message shown when validationState="warning". Included in aria-describedby.

props.name: size
props.description: Control spacing and typography scale. Valid values: s, m, l, xl

props.name: validationState
props.description: Visual and a11y state. Valid values: default, success, error, warning

props.name: required
props.description: Adds a visual asterisk in the label. Use native required on the input to enforce validation.

props.name: showValidationIcon
props.description: Toggle the inline validation icon for non-default states.
